description: If n = p_1^e_1 * ... * p_k^e_k, p_1 < ... < p_k primes, then a(n) = p_k^e_k.
comments: Let p be the largest prime dividing n. a(n) is the largest power of p dividing n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = A006530(n)^A071178(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 27 2011a(n) = A141809(n,A001221(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 29 2013
mathematica: Table[Power @@ Last @ FactorInteger @ n, {n, 79}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Apr 01 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a053585 = last . a141809_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 29 2013(PARI) a(n)=if(n>1,my(f=factor(n)); f[#f~,1]^f[#f~,2],1) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 10 2015
author: Frederick Magata (frederick.magata(AT)uni-muenster.de), Jan 19 2000
extensions: More terms from Andrew Gacek (andrew(AT)dgi.net), Apr 20 2000
